episode of.title: Live! From E.V.I.L: Evil Villain Island Lair (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Even Villains have something to say during the holidays.

2.title: Therapist of EVIL!

episode of.title: Live! From E.V.I.L: Evil Villain Island Lair (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Heroes... Villains... They all need mental help.

3.title: The Sewers of EVIL!

episode of.title: Live! From E.V.I.L: Evil Villain Island Lair (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Deep in the bowels of EVIL, a cliff-hanger emerges!

4.title: Escape from EVIL!

episode of.title: Live! From E.V.I.L: Evil Villain Island Lair (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Weevil's been kidnapped! Can our heroes escape from the sewer in time to save him? And what is Doc Matter's dark secret?

5.title: EVIL Noir!

episode of.title: Live! From E.V.I.L: Evil Villain Island Lair (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: EVIL goes back in time for it's first Noir episode! Watch it in "Noir View" revealing dozens of classic quotes from Film Noir movies!

7.title: Gathering of EVIL!

episode of.title: Live! From E.V.I.L: Evil Villain Island Lair (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Virgil Villain is throwing a "Lair Warming Party" to meet his neighbors - Will this be the end of his reign on Evil Island?

imdb.plot outline: Live! from E.V.I.L. (Evil Villain Island Lair) A short-format animation series about what happens to the Heroes and Villains between all that fighting. Shot in a pseudo-reality-show style. Coming to you Live! from Evil Island, see Virgil Villain (villain), Weevil (henchman), Guy Goodman (hero), and Sparky (sidekick) as they grapple with the day-to-day problems that prevent them from achieving their goals. Joined by a full cast of characters including the Announcersaurus and the nefarious Doc Matter! (mueahahahhaha!) Episodes and more information at the official site: LiveFromEvil.com
imdb.title: Live! From E.V.I.L: Evil Villain Island Lair
